A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie tries too hard to be humorous like the new MCU movies\, which is not needed or required\, and completely out of place in the movie. These movies are essentially sci-fi war movies\, constant humor and War movies is never seen. Also not a fan of Fin and Rose side adventure\, seems like they are forcing characters into the new storyline. Fin now seems extremely out of place in the story with Rey and Kylo.
